metadata.Title: CVE-2019-16095 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Symonics libmysofa 0.7 has an invalid read in getDimension inhrtf/reader.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-16095` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmysofa-utils - 0.6~dfsg0-3+deb10u1build1
libmysofa0 - 0.6~dfsg0-3+deb10u1build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libmysofa package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.6~dfsg0-3+deb10u1build1').
